sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) The character may spend one Destiny point to perform a Terrifying Kill maneuver immediately after conducting a successful attack where the target is incapacitated or suffers a critical injury (the character must still be able to perform maneuvers, and may not perform more than two maneuvers in a turn). The character rolls force dice no greater than his force rating, and may spend force points to inflict 1 strain on any other characters within short range of that target (and may do so multiple times). A character who has purchased this talent automatically gains 1 conflict at the beginning of a game session.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Terrifying Kill</name> <number>TAL0001319</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-19 04:52:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6cf1114c2f030d10e0f497eef699b6ad</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-19 04:52:08</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
